intro: Gyrinops versteegii, commonly known as the yellow starfish plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and clusters of small, star-shaped yellow flowers. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, showcasing adaptations to drought conditions. Gyrinops versteegii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and low maintenance requirements.
